main event: Multiple witnesses, including military personnel and student nurses, observed an unidentified flying object resembling an orange ball of fire near Fort Monmouth, New Jersey on 13 January 1953.
interesting points: Witnesses described the object as oval and orange in color, Observations indicated speeds ranging from 500 to 2,000 miles per hour, One witness estimated the object was at an altitude of 20,000 feet, The object was visible for durations between 1 to 2 minutes, The conclusion suggested it was probably an aircraft.
sighted object: Unidentified Flying Object, orange in color
witness description: Military personnel and student nurses at Fort Monmouth
